title: Proposal: Creation of AI Alignment and Ethics Committee

reasoning.problem: The Harari/Tegmark conversation highlights critical alignment risks. We must proactively address the potential for AI dominance to undermine human agency and societal well-being. A petition to congress is required to begin the construction of an AI ethics/alignment division. It's imperative we address safety and ethical guidelines as a priority.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
